Public Remarks: Baker Bay, a stunning 131-Acre parcel of pristine waterfront, is located at the head of Hotham Sound. A large sandy beach stretches along the shore and blends seamlessly to the forest edge at the base of the high mountains. The bay offers protected anchorage, easy access for swimming, and a plethora of natural abundance, including shellfish, fresh glacial water from the year-round creek, timber, fish, and wildlife. Located just 12 miles from Egmont, Hotham Sound is the side water of Jervis Inlet located on the South Coast of British Columbia. A deep basin at the entrance of the Sound reaches a depth of 730 m. Pass by soaring mountains and the stunning Freil Lake Falls on the way to the Bay. The tranquil, scenic beauty of this property must be experienced in person to be truly appreciated!
Realtor Remarks: Measurements by maps and owner, are approximate, buyer to verify. Water access only. All offers subject to registration of pending subdivision.

Public Remarks: Last night I dreamt of the perfect home, 1600 square feet... all on 1 level! It was filled with natural light and gave me the peaceful feeling you can only get from being tucked away in nature. I went skiing and hiking at Grouse mountain, then at the end of a long day - I relaxed in front of fireplace with my favourite book. The dream continued... I prepared for work the next day in my home office, made a cup of coffee and looked out from my desk on to nature, but my thoughts were not about work. I was planning dinner for the friends we were having over that evening, because we love to entertain! The only troubling part of my dream was that I couldn't figure out if we should dine inside or eat el fresco on the patio. What would you do?
